findings.rationale: Lack of indemnification can expose a party to significant financial risk in case of breaches or legal claims.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Absence of audit rights limits the ability to verify compliance with the terms, increasing the risk of undisclosed breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: A fixed term of three years may lead to a lapse in confidentiality if not renewed, potentially exposing sensitive information.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution.
